channel.title: Minigolf Tournament[Winner: Rodgerwilco]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Minigolf Tournament[/size] [size=18pt]Stolen since it never got anywhere last time.[/size] http://www.playforia.com/play/minigolf/[/center] [b]Game overview:[/b] Direct, measure the power and click – Hole in One! You need accuracy to your putts, power to sand barriers and pasted tracks. Mathematical thinking is needed to hits with the help of walls. Endless amount of tracks and levels – play on your own, or challenge a friend! [b]Tournament explanation:[/b] [i]Round 1[/i] is the preliminary round. Each player will be randomly paired with another. Each pair is given 36 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to Round 2. [i]Round 2[/i] is yet another preliminary round. The winning player of a pair in Round 1 will face the winning player of another pair in Round 1. Each pair is given 24 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to the semi-finals. [i]Semi-finals[/i] is a round of 4 where players fight it out to qualify for the finals. The winning player of a pair in Round 2 will face the winning player of another pair in Round 2. Each pair is given 24 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to the finals. [i]Finals[/i] is the ultimate round. Beat the other player and you win! Note: if all players complete a round before the round expires, the next round will begin! Additionally, because the previous attempt at this competition went to shit, any participant that disappears/doesn't reply will be disqualified. [b]Frequently asked questions:[/b] [i]What happens if I am disconnected during a battle?[/i] If you have overwhelming evidence that you were disconnected (ie, a screenshot), talk to me about it and you will be entitled to a rematch before the next round begins. [i]What happens if my partner doesn't reply to me during the round time?[/i] If you can't contact your partner, provide overwhelming evidence of your activity to me. If I also cannot contact your partner, you advance to the next round. Otherwise, which one of you continues to the next round will be randomly chosen. [i]Am I entitled to a rematch?[/i] Yes. However, you cannot force your partner to give you a rematch. Both of you must be willing to have a rematch. In short, you can play as many games as you wish but only post the screenshot of a game if your opponent does not want a rematch. If your opponent screws you over, (ie you win, he asks for a rematch, you lose the rematch, he refuses to rematch) then it's too bad. [i]What type of game do I play?[/i] Before starting the game, ensure that it is configured as such:
Number of tracks: up to you Track types: Only "basic" Max strokes per track: up to you Stroke time limit: 0:30 When ball goes to water: Back to start Ball collisions: Yes Scoring: Stroke-scoring Weight end: No
This is to ensure that all games are fair and all players play in a fixed environment. At the end of each game, include the top of the chatbox (scroll up) and take a screenshot of it (along with the results). While I may not know all conditions of the game, the screenshot will at least show me the stroke time limit and the track type. [b]Participants:[/b] [ol][li][s]Krackkid[/s][/li] [li][s]Travas[/s][/li] [li][s]runescape sucks[/s][/li] [li][s]vManlyMan[/s][/li] [li][s]KroniKz_[/s][/li] [li]Bowser jr[/li] [li][s]Flame_[/s][/li] [li][s]Cole1497[/s][/li] [li][s]Si Force[/s][/li] [li][s]Rix_[/s][/li] [li]Niall[/li] [li][s]asshole[/s][/li] [li][s]the elve age[/s][/li] [li]Rodgerwilco[/li] [li]mihalich[/li] [li][s]drubrkletern[/s][/li][/ol] [hr] Thanks to this lovely site on making the bracket and randomizing the people ;D [hr] [img]http://images.challonge.com/MoparMiniGolf.png[/img] [hr] The bracket mite look a little funny, because it shows +however many the other person was compared the who they where facing. Please allow me at least 24hours to update the bracket after a match.
